name: PAS_model
description: Port Activities Scenario model from CATIE.

connectors.description: this connector provides info of the necessary parameters to be able to request the IH via HTTP

input.name: settings
input.description: Optional (default is provided). Settings for the PAS_model to produce a PAS. Used for components selection (PAS builder and outcome modules as energy consumption and pollutant emissions) with the corresponding settings

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id of the datasource in the IH repo

input.name: vesselCalls_collection
input.description: Required. List of vessels stopover in terminal that will require to be handled. Each one is converter to one or more handlings (e.g. if unloading then loading): Vessel-calls (1 --> N) Handlings

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id of the datasource in the IH repo

input.name: assignments_collection
input.description: Required. List of handling profile assignment to a supplychain. Each assignment object assign a handlings with specified characteristics to a specific supply-chain (or to a preferentially ordered list of supply-chains). Used for handling assignation to a supplychain: Handling (1 --> 1) Supplychain

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id of the datasource in the IH repo

input.name: supplychains_collection
input.description: Required. List of available supply-chains (sequence of operations) for handling a vessel's content. Used for resources allocation: Supply-chain (1 --> N) Operations

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id of the datasource in the IH repo

input.name: resources_collection
input.description: Required. List of available resources (machines, areas etc) for supply-chain's operations. Used by PAS_builder for use calculation (scheduling) and by outcome modules (energy consumption, pollutant emission): Resource (1 --> N) Operations

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id of the datasource in the IH repo

input.name: timetables_collection
input.description: Optional. List of available timetables (working days & hours) for resources. Used by PAS_builder for use calculation (scheduling): Timetable (1 --> N) Resources

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id of the datasource in the IH repo

input.name: priority_tree
input.description: Optional. Hierarchical sequence of vessel-call attributes defining the handling's priority. Used to resolve resources allocation priority (in case of competition for access to a resource in the same time)

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id of the datasource in the IH repo

output.name: PAS
output.description: Port's Activities Scenario: for each terminal, and then each ship, and then each stopover, and then each handling, the corresponding activities. For each of those activities, a scheduling and a list of used resources. Depending on outcome modules, information can be added for each of those resources, as a list of energy consumptions, pollutant emission etc.

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id to store the result in the IH repo

output.name: internalLog
output.description: PAS model's internal log. Useful to enlighten the provided PAS and spot issues (discarded handlings etc)

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id to store the result in the IH repo

output.name: usedInputs
output.description: The used inputs to produce the PAS (settings, vessel-calls, port's parameters). Instead of duplicate data, a simple copy of the PAS_instance that was passed to the PAS_model (therefore, the url in the IH of the documents instead of the documents content

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id to store the result in the IH repo

logging.name: PAS-builder_Platform-logging
logging.description: activity logging for the energy-consumption model. id_execution is given by the OT at invocation time

metadata:.usage: optional, future use or extra logic for each model, no specific structure

options.name: sourceId
options.description: id to store the log activity in the IH repo
